properties.address: Lasswade Library, 19 Eskdale Drive, Bonnyrigg, EH19 2LA
properties.description: Free tea, coffee or a cup of soup available - just ask the library staff. Free Wi-Fi, toilets, books, jigsaws and card games. Staff can also advise on getting all the support you are entitled to during the cost of living crisis. During normal opening hours.
